txt.en:
'Fish are part of everyone's diet in this area. We all eat fish, however, not all fish are eaten. There are many varieties that have their own distinct flavours and textures.

'My favourite is also one of the most difficult to catch. Like me, it has a selective appetite and will only bite if there is specific bait on the hook.

'Find the bait in Calembel, use it and apply it to your hook. It won't last long, so be quick about getting to the water and seeing if you can catch any.'
Torchuil is in Dol Amroth.\n\nTorchuil will be pleased to see the fish you caught.
Use worms to catch Calembel Carp ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Calembel Carp can be caught at Calembel to the north-east of Dol Amroth.\n\nTorchuil asked you to go to Calembel, gather some bait and catch some special fish.
You have baited your pole, time to fish!
Calembel Carp are a delicacy in this area. However, they can only be caught when using a special type of bait, which must be found.
'These delicacies will sell well on the market.'
